description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 9/22/2005

Ridge welcomes Dante to Forrester Creations, but he is amazed to learn Dante and Brooke are dating. Bridget gushes to Eric about her upcoming wedding. Nick continues to beg Brooke not to attend the wedding, when Bridget interrupts them, beaming about the wedding. Despite Brooke’s better judgment, Bridget convinces her to attend the wedding. Later, Eric reminds Brooke that this wedding won’t be easy for her. Eric walks Bridget down the “aisle” on Nick’s boat. When it’s Nick’s turn to say “I do”, he hesitates, locking eyes with Brooke.
